name: Stack'em
description:
A self imposed 48 hour game jam by BunnyHearted and Avery Dance. You must stack the stock of infinite spawning items to rack up a score - and try not to get fired! There are some performance issues and menu issues for the webgl version. For the best version of the game download the executable.

Find BunnyHearted here: 

https://www.twitch.tv/bunnyhearted

https://twitter.com/BunnyHeartedGG

Find Avery Dance here:

https://www.twitch.tv/ms_dance

https://twitter.com/MsAveryDance
